content: in 2022 a predivorce agreement was made between two parties the agreement was notarized by a notary named sledge the document outlines the progress of a divorce case between mr and mrs names omitted the parties have declared their intention to divorce by mutual consent and have made arrangements regarding their marriage children and property they have agreed on coparenting division of assets and debts maintenance contributions for the children and other important matters the document also includes provisions regarding inheritance gifts and renouncement of certain rights the parties have confirmed their identities and authority to sign the document they understand the potential consequences and any conflicts of interest a draft deed has been prepared by the notary and the parties have received and reviewed it they are satisfied with the electronic copy and have paid a fee for the notarys services the document has been explained to them and they have signed it
